dict.string: 快速切换 DNS 服务器设置

function inet() { local net=$(netstat -rn | awk '/default/{print $NF}') echo $(networksetup -listnetworkserviceorder | \ awk "/$net/{print \$3}" | tr -d ', ') }
dns=$(echo "{query}" | awk -F: '{print $2}' | sed 's/+/ /g') name=$(echo "{query}" | awk -F: '{print $1}')
# Clear the dns sudo dscacheutil -flushcache
# Set the dns servers sudo networksetup -setdnsservers "$(inet)" $dns
echo "Switch DNS to $name" echo $dns | sed 's/ / vs /g'
